newsitem.title: USA: Green Oasis sees Q1 profit from sale.
newsitem.headline: Green Oasis sees Q1 profit from sale.

text.p: Green Oasis Environmental Inc said on Wednesday that its agreement to sell a waste oil processing unit to Ardmore Capital Corp in Europe ensures that the company will be profitable in the first quarter of 1997.
This unit is being resold by Ardmore to a Spanish group and is the first of what is expected to be a total order for five processing units, Green Oasis said.
Terms were not disclosed, but payments will be made as manufacturing progresses, Green Oasis said. Final installation is estimated in March 1997.
